subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. All-Star Game on Sunday in Montreal commemorates the founding of the Canadiens a century ago, but another gathering of the league’s best players a half-century ago is all but forgotten.
snippet: The N.H.L. All-Star Game on Sunday in Montreal commemorates the founding of the Canadiens a century ago, but another gathering of the league’s best players a half-century ago is all but forgotten.
